info.title: Blog Post Api
info.description: This is a fully functioned blog post api, with user authentiacation, multiple file uploads , file streaming , comments and more...

get.description: This endpoint provides the details of a specific user.
This endpoint provides the user list with pagination.

parameters.name: lt
parameters.description: number of results to be fetched/no of results per page, defaults to be 5

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page no you want, defaults to be 1

201.description: User created successfully.Please login to continue.

example-1.message: User created successfully.Please login to continue.

value.message: User created successfully.Please login to continue.
User with this email already exists,please try with a different account or login.

requestBody.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to create a new user.

example-1.message: We will miss you, random user

value.message: We will miss you, random user

post.description: This validates user token and grant access to certain post and comments related operations.

requestBody.description: You have to request with the user email and password.

post.description: This end point destorys the user token.

put.description: This endpoint sets user's profile pic.

requestBody.description: send the picture user want to set as profile pic..file size must be below 1mb. Accepted file types are : png,jpg,jpeg,JPEG

delete.description: This endpoint removes user profile pic..

example-1.message: Mail has been sent to your account,If not found please check your spam folder

value.message: Mail has been sent to your account,If not found please check your spam folder

put.description: this endpoint generate reset password link and mails it to user...

example-1.message: Password has been reset,please login to continue

value.message: Password has been reset,please login to continue

example-1.message: Password and confirm password must be same

value.message: Password and confirm password must be same

example-1.message: Invalid reset token or token has been expired, please try again

value.message: Invalid reset token or token has been expired, please try again

put.description: This endpoints sets new user password.

requestBody.description: user must request with new password and confirm password

Results.title: The brown fox story
Results.description: Once a fix was feeling very hungry . She wandered around in search of food. Finally having exhausted herself , she sat under a tree. She noticed a crow sitting on the tree. He had a small piece of meat in its beak. The Fox wanted to have the piece for herself at all costs . She thought of a good plan. Changing her tone she said Dear crow , your voice is so swee I would be so lucky if I get to hear a song in your sweet voice . The crow was delighted because of the unexpected praise he got. The moment he started singing , the piece fell from his mouth. The Fox ate it at once.Moral is Think before you act Don''t be fooled by false praise
Results.author: 62de52f140327b2c63fb15a9

value.message: Invalid value for srt query parameter:: mp

get.description: with this end point you can get customized post list with some specific queries...

parameters.name: lt
parameters.description: Request per page / no of result you want in a single query. Default value 5

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The no of page you want to request

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: the word to search for in title and description of post

parameters.name: srt
parameters.description: for most recent -> mr, for most liked -> ml.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: you can put a single tag and get all the posts that includes the tag, note again the parameter is tags not tag.

requestBody.description: Title must be 5 characters long and below 35 characters.Description must be 150-1000 characters long.tags will be an array of strings. Media can be an array of files with key "media". Accepted file types are -  png|jpg|jpeg|JPEG|webp|gif|mp4|3gp|mkv|flv|mpg|avi|wav

get.summary: Get a specific post by their id
get.description: This end point  provides a single requested post

delete.description: Delete post and all its comments

get.summary: Get user specific posts by userId
get.description: This end point will provide all posts of a single user with customized result.

parameters.name: lt
parameters.description: Request per page / no of result you want in a single query. Default value 5

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The no of page you want to request

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: the word to search for in title and description of post

parameters.name: srt
parameters.description: for most recent -> mr, for most liked -> ml.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: you can put a single tag and get all the posts that includes the tag, note again the parameter is tags not tag.

post.description: add a reaction to the post

requestBody.description: valid reaction types are like,love,haha,care,lol. Default reaction love.

put.description: update a reaction to the post

requestBody.description: valid reaction types are like,love,haha,care,lol. Default reaction love.
